name: SalPykroeTalkNPC
commands: Who, me? It is I, Pykroe, fortune's favourite!

Luck has brought me here!|Why else?|It seems you and I were destined to meet!
Destined? Anwyay, how would you like to help us?
Me and my crew are mercenaries!|We'll help you... at a price! Nyaha!
I promise we can reward you very nicely, so long as you trust me.
Welcome aboard. I am Sal, commander of Arcei.
Well, Arcein general, bear witness to my divine luck! Haha!
Who, me? It is I, Pykroe, fortune's favourite!|Or, was, until I lost my friend, Hyper...

Luck works in mysterious ways...|Though, it seems you and I were destined to meet!
